strings.name: NYU mHealth Initiative Mapping Corps
strings.description: YouthMappers chapter at New York University
strings.extendedDescription: The NYU mobile health or “mHealth” research initiative focuses on development of systems that link people - usually via their phones - to the places that they live and traverse, and thus supports novel research on the way phones and maps can be leveraged to understand behavioral decision making and ultimately health outcomes.
